summary: A cleaver-wielding bridal designer murders various young brides-to-be in an attempt to unlock a repressed childhood trauma.
cast: Stephen Forsyth|Dagmar Lassander|Laura Betti|Jesús Puente|Femi Benussi|Antonia Mas|Luciano Pigozzi|Gérard Tichy|Verónica Llimerá|Pasquale Fortunato|Ignasi Abadal|Silvia Lienas|Montserrat Riba Vidal|Susy Andersen|Guido Barlocci|Bruno Boschetti|Elina De Witt|Rika Dialyna|Boris Karloff|Glauco Onorato
keywords: serial murder|italian cinema|spanish cinema|human monster|spanish horror
title: Un hacha para la luna de miel
